mdRecord.dcterms:title: Family Correspondence and Personal Letter Sent from Camp Pryor near Manassas Junction from C. M. Stigleman
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Family correspondence, personal letter dated August 10, 1861 to “My Dear Little Wife,” sent from Camp Pryor near Manassas Junction, C. M. Stigleman. 1 original piece, 2 photocopied pages and 1 ½ typed transcription pages.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Records and correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
